message.raw: Added dTRIMESH_OPCODE_16BIT build option to allow an OPCODE trimesh to be specified using 16-bit indices. Feature inspired by patch [ 1170247 ] by Geoff Carlton. Default is 32-bit.
message.html: Added dTRIMESH_OPCODE_16BIT build option to allow an OPCODE trimesh to be specified using 16-bit indices. Feature inspired by patch [ 1170247 ] by Geoff Carlton. Default is 32-bit.
